title: Finiteness and cofiniteness of fine Selmer groups over function fields
authors: Sohan Ghosh, Jishnu Ray, Takashi Suzuki
abstract:
We prove that the dual fine Selmer group of an abelian variety over the
unramified $\mathbb{Z}_{p}$-extension of a function field is finitely generated
over $\mathbb{Z}_{p}$. This is a function field version of a conjecture of
Coates--Sujatha. We further prove that the fine Selmer group is finite
(respectively zero) if the separable $p$-primary torsion of the abelian variety
is finite (respectively zero).
